testcase.title: 001) CI Executive will see all the 'View all' options

steps.title: I logged in as a "CIProfCTIUSRegistry" user with access to "Mercer" project
the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I expand "competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify "competitive intelligence" the Accordions in Home page are open
I check 'View All' section is displayed in tile 1 "Competitive Intelligence" accordion
I verify 'View All' links for "Competitive Intelligence" accordion are present
I click on "Companies" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

substeps.message: User is navigated to Companies report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Companies" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in Table view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "Table" view
I verify if "Number of Drugs In Active Development" and "Highest to Lowest"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button is clicked

steps.title: I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel
I click on "Deals" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

substeps.message: User is navigated to Deals report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Deals" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in Table view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "Table" view
I verify if "Most Recent Event Date" and "Most Recent"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button is clicked

steps.title: I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel
I click on "Drugs" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Drugs" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in Table view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "Table" view
I verify if "Last Change Date" and "Most Recent"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button is clicked

steps.title: I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel
I click on "Literature" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in List view

I verify if "Added Date" and "Most Recent"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

testcase.title: 004) CI users(with CTI) will see all the 'View all' options

steps.title: I logged in as a "CIProfCTIUSRegistry" user with access to "Mercer" project
the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I expand "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify "Competitive intelligence" the Accordions in Home page are open
I check 'View All' section is displayed in tile 1 "Competitive Intelligence" accordion
I verify "CT.gov trials" link absent in 'View All' links
I collapse "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I expand "Clinical trials intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify 'View All' links for "Clinical Trials Intelligence" accordion are present
I collapse "Clinical trials intelligence" Accordion in Home Page

I verify "Deals" link absent in 'View All' links
I collapse "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I expand "Deals intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify 'View All' links for "Deals Intelligence" accordion are present
I collapse "Deals intelligence" Accordion in Home Page

I verify "Patents" link absent in 'View All' links
I collapse "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page

testcase.title: 008)On opening the CI accordion patents gazette selected on tile 2 by default
